This information may be different than what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider or specific product’s site. For any discrepancy in product information, please refer to the financial institution’s website for the most updated version. All financial products and services are presented without warranty. Additionally, this site may be compensated through third party advertisers. However, the results of our comparison tools which are not marked as sponsored are always based on objective analysis first.
Best Dah Sing Credit Cards in Hong Kong
Dah Sing British Airways Platinum Card
HK$150,000 Round trip discounts for British Airways
Dah Sing ANA World Mastercard
HK$150,000 Extra miles by using ANA flights
Dah Sing Autotoll E-Serve Credit Card
HK$150,000 Autotoll automatic top-up
Dah Sing One+ Credit Card
HK$150,000 Auto reload Octopus to earn rewards
Dah Sing Credit Card Promotions and Offers
Dah Sing offers a wide variety of promotions and offers for new and existing credit card customers. Offers can range from dining privileges at popular restaurants in Hong Kong to online shipping deals at various eCommerce merchants.
Online Shopping Offers
With Dah Sing’s eButler experience, credit card customers can get year-round privileges and discounts from a variety of online merchants, including travel booking portals and online shopping platforms.
Bonus Point Rewards
Dah Sing credit card customers can accumulate points and redeem them for cash coupons at popular stores in Hong Kong, such as PARK N SHOP and SOGO. Dah Sing credit card points can also be redeemed for mileage (12 points = 1 mile).
Year-Round Credit Card Offers
Dah Sing credit card customers can get discounts at all sorts of merchants in Hong Kong, including restaurants, shops, and travel merchants. Please note that these offers are subject to specific terms and conditions.
What Makes AEON Credit Cards Stand Out
Dah Sing British Airways Platinum Card
Enjoy HK$6 = 1 Avios on local purchases, HK$6 = 1.5 Avios on overseas purchases and HK$6 = 2 Avios on spending on your birthday
Book your flights online at www.ba.com or at the British Airways Hong Kong ticket office to earn double Avios (Every HK$6 spent= 2 Avios)
10% discount on round trip air ticket at www.ba.com 
Redeem tickets with oneworld® partner airlines as well as cabin upgrades
No charges on the conversion for miles
Welcome offer: up to 10,000 Avios
Minimum income: HK$150,000
Annual fee: HK$1,800
Dah Sing One+ Credit Card
1% cash rebate on local and overseas spending with no cap 
1% cash rebate on Automatic Add Value Service (AAVS)
Welcome offer: up to HK$900 cash rebate 
Minimum income: HK$150,000
Annual fee: HK$1,800
First 2-year annual fee waiver
Dah Sing ANA World Mastercard
HK$8 = 1 Mile on all local and overseas purchases
Enjoy priority check-in privilege at ANA Business class check-in counter (apply to flights operated by ANA)
Principal Cardholders can enjoy an extra 25% mileage (apply to flights operated by ANA)
10% off ANA In-flight Shopping
10% off at ANA group duty free shops and 5% off at ANA FESTA at the Airports
Every JPY100 spent= 1 mile at ANA FESTA
No handling fees on miles conversion
Minimum income: HK$150,000
Annual fee: HK$1,200
First year annual fee waiver
Dah Sing Autotoll E-Serve Credit Card
Autotoll automatic top-up
Enjoy Autotoll administration fee (HK$420) and Unitoll service fee (HK$180) rebate for the first 12 months.
Minimum income: HK$150,000
Annual fee: HK$1,800
First 3-year annual fee waiver
Dah Sing Credit Card Hotline
The general customer service hotline for Dah Sing is 2828 8168. You can request to waive the Dah Sing credit card annual fee by pressing the following hotkeys: 2 > 6. You can also report a lost or stolen card by calling 2828 8188.
Dah Sing Credit Card Fees
Annual fee isn’t the only fee to consider when you get a credit card. Here are some other service charges associated with Dah Sing credit cards in Hong Kong.
Card Minimum Payment
The lowest amount you are required to pay per month to avoid any penalties. With Dah Sing, the minimum payment is HK$50 or total amount of bank service fees plus 1% of total outstanding balance (whichever is higher).
Late Credit Card Fee
The amount you are charged when a credit card payment is received after the specified due date. With Dah Sing, the late fee for credit cards is HK$250 or an amount equivalent to the minimum payment (whichever is lower).
New Card Replacement
You have to pay HK$120 to replace lost Dah Sing credit cards.
Dah Sing Credit Card Frequently Asked Questions
Can Dah Sing credit cards earn air miles?
Yes. Dah Sing ANA World Mastercard and Dah Sing British Airways Platinum Card are designed to collect miles. Dah Sing British Airways Platinum Card offers HK$6 = 1 Avios on local spent; HK$6 = 1.5 Avios on overseas spent; HK$6 = 2 Avios on spending on your birthday. Dah Sing ANA World Mastercard offers HK$8 = 1 Mile on all local and overseas purchases.
Can I apply for Dah Sing credit cards if I’m a student?
Yes. Dah Sing One+ Titanium Card is designed for full-time university/college student.
How do you check the application status of a Dah Sing credit card?
You can check the credit card application status by submitting an enquiry via their online application status form. You may also find out the status of the credit card application by giving their customer service hotline a call.
Can you make tax payments with a Dah Sing credit card?
During Hong Kong tax season, Dah Sing may offer special promotions for eligible credit customers. For example, Dah Sing customers who make their tax payments with their credit cards may be eligible for cash rebates.
Can you make bill payments with a Dah Sing credit card?
Dah Sing offers an e-bill service that allows customers to easily make their bill payments with their credit cards. Merchants include government organizations such as the water supplies department and telecommunication services such as 1010 and SmarTone.
